name: Hide and Go Seek: Monster Hunt
name_original: Hide and Go Seek: Monster Hunt
description:
Hide and Go Seek, a boyhood favorite, has been transformed into a more fascinating and amazing mobile game

A mystery welcome to Hide and Go Seek: Monster Hunt

You will play as a group of friends who are in small size and stay in a big area with a lot of things, with the ability to transform into items and the mission of hiding and escaping the orange giant's pursuit.

Sound easy, huh? You will see

HOW TO PLAY
- Turn to item, drag to move and find out the place to hide
- Hide carefully so that they won't feel strange and catch you
- Also turn into boss and find all suspicious friends in the room

GAME FEATURE
- Never End Level
- Stunning graphic and smooth movement
- Various cool skins

Challenge your hiding skill in Hide and Go Seek: Monster Hunt

DOWNLOAD NOW
